subject: New files
author: Jules
full_text:
I just posted a few new files, and I must admit, this is becoming an 
addiction!  I know why most of you only run the recording for a short 
period of time, given the responses you get as far a quanity.  

The first file listed I can not make out the rest of the answer 
received and would like some input.  

Thanks!
Juli
